sentences.sContent: Their wedding was marred by the death of Jenny’s mother a week earlier.
sentences.sCn: 一周之前珍妮母亲的过世使他们的婚礼蒙上了一层阴影。

sentences.sContent: A frown marred his handsome features.
sentences.sCn: 紧锁的眉头破坏了他俊美的面容。

remMethod.val: “骂” → 弄坏了东西， 所以挨骂 → 损坏

trans.tranOther: to make something less attractive or enjoyable
